name: Hulk

abilities.name: Smash
abilities.details: Powerful melee punches. Attack speed increases slightly with Rage.

abilities.name: Ground Slam
abilities.details: Slams the ground, damaging and disrupting nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Gamma Leap
abilities.details: Performs a massive leap. Deals damage upon landing.

ultimate.name: Worldbreaker
ultimate.effect: Enters maximum rage: Massively increased Damage, Damage Reduction, Speed, and Health Regen for 10 seconds.
ultimate.details: Unleashes the Hulk's full, uncontrollable power temporarily.

passives.name: Rage
passives.details: Builds Rage meter (up to 100) by dealing and taking damage. Rage increases damage dealt and movement speed, and provides passive damage reduction.

teamups.effect: Gamma Leap cooldown reduced when landing near Black Widow.

lore: Dr. Bruce Banner, exposed to gamma radiation, transforms into the incredibly strong and nigh-indestructible Hulk when angered or stressed. The angrier he gets, the stronger he becomes.
